Package com.ivantk.skproj.services

Interface ProductService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProductServiceImpl

    public interface ProductService
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Service class for Product that extend rmi interface Remote.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addProduct​(Product product, java.lang.String storeName)
      Function that adds a product to database in store with specified name.
      void deleteProduct​(java.lang.String productName, java.lang.String storeName)
      Function that delete a product from database in store with specified name.
      Product findProduct​(java.lang.String productName, java.lang.String storeName)
      Function that returns a product in specified store.
      java.util.List<Product> getAllProducts​(java.lang.String storeName)
      Function that returns a list of products by specified store.
      void updateProduct​(Product oldProduct, Product newProduct, java.lang.String oldStoreName, java.lang.String newStoreName)
      Function that update a product or replace it from other store.

    • Method Detail

      • addProduct

        void addProduct​(Product product,
                java.lang.String storeName)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Function that adds a product to database in store with specified name.
        Parameters:
        product - product to add
        storeName - store in which the product is placed
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - check remote exception

      • getAllProducts

        java.util.List<Product> getAllProducts​(java.lang.String storeName)
                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Function that returns a list of products by specified store.
        Parameters:
        storeName - store on which products are located
        Returns:
        list of Product
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - check remote exception

      • updateProduct

        void updateProduct​(Product oldProduct,
                   Product newProduct,
                   java.lang.String oldStoreName,
                   java.lang.String newStoreName)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Function that update a product or replace it from other store.
        Parameters:
        oldProduct - product to update
        newProduct - product after the update
        oldStoreName - store in which the product is placed
        newStoreName - store in which the product is placed after update
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - check remote exception

      • deleteProduct

        void deleteProduct​(java.lang.String productName,
                   java.lang.String storeName)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Function that delete a product from database in store with specified name.
        Parameters:
        productName - product name to delete
        storeName - store name in which the product is placed
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - check remote exception

      • findProduct

        Product findProduct​(java.lang.String productName,
                    java.lang.String storeName)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Function that returns a product in specified store. Return null, in case there is no product.
        Parameters:
        productName - product are looking for
        storeName - store on which products are located
        Returns:
        Product
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - check remote exception
